column2: ONLY USE THIS FILE for vanilla replacements and non-dialogue; text that may be used in multiple different places
CUTE damage makes a good first (or last) impression on your opponent.\nSuccessful CUTE attacks will deal bonus damage if the opponent is below 25% or above 75% CHARM!
CHARMING damage is perfect if you're looking to show off to your opponent.\nSuccessful CHARMING attacks will temporarily increase your opponent's other damage multipliers!
CLEVER damage can give you the upper hand... if you've got the brains for it.\nSuccessful CLEVER attacks will slow the TEMPO of the battle!
COMEDIC damage poses a large risk, but an equally large reward...\nSuccessful COMEDIC attacks will restore your health, but missing will damage you!
A standard, slow projectile\n'Simple bits of affection will work on almost anyone.'
A burst of two short-range projectiles\n'Melt your opponent's heart with some special attention.'
A fast and pulling long-range projectile\n'Give your opponent a captivating glance to draw them in for more.'
A strong, heavy projectile\n'Be bold, and hit your opponents head-on... Don't make them chase after you.'
A stationary explosive projectile that gives you a burst of momentum\n'Know when to catch your opponent off-guard. Impress them!'
Three slow projectiles shot behind your back\n'Be open and honest always. It's scary, but worth it...'
A long-lasting projectile that bounces several times\n'Ramble about what you love to anyone willing to listen.'
A slow projectile that gains damage over time\n'Always think ahead. Know how your opponent will react to your actions.'
An slow projectile that zaps forward after a moment\n'Read between the lines. You know more about your opponent than you may think...'
A fast projectile with high knockback\n'Practice your timing, and even the simplest of jokes can have momentous effects.'
A decelerating projectile with high recoil\n'You can try being particularly direct... But sublety does have its benefits.'
An accurate rapid-fire projectile\n'Even simple jokes can help your opponent to let their guard down.'
A weak projectile with no special properties\n'Mistakes can be endearing... Sometimes.'
Draws 2 spells and adds lifetime to the cast\n'Demonstrate commitment towards your ACTIONS to enhance their effects.'
Press [KICK] to dash in your current movement direction.\nWarning: You are not invincible during the cape's dash!\nDuration: 14 frames. Cooldown: 3 seconds.
Press [KICK] to destroy nearby enemy projectiles with precise timing.\nOn a successful parry, recharges instantly and grants brief invincibility.\nDuration: 8 frames. Cooldown: 5 seconds.
Press [KICK] to slow down all projectiles for a time.\n\nDuration: 5 seconds. Cooldown: 15 seconds.
Press [KICK] to power up your projectiles for a time.\nAll of your projectiles will create a damaging explosion a moment after they expire.\nDuration: 8 seconds. Cooldown: 20 seconds.
